original_text: So now finish doing it as well, so that your readiness in desiring it may be matched by your completing it out of what you have.
korean_text: 이제는 하던 일을 성취할지니 마음에 원하던 것과 같이 완성하되 있는 대로 하라

sentences.original_text: So now finish doing it as well
so that your readiness in desiring it
may be matched by your completing it
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그것을 완성하는 것으로 균형을 이루어
